definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: AIM To investigate the pharmacokinetic profile of carbamazepine (CBZ) in Chinese epilepsy patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察中国癫痫患者卡马西平的群体药动学参数。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the pharmacokinetics of fosfomycin in Chinese healthy volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察磷霉素在体内的药动学过程。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the dynamic affection on human of ciclosporin A.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析环孢素A的人体药动学影响因素。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study pharmacokinetics of norcantharidin in human by urinary excretion method.
sentences.chinese: 目的采用尿药法进行去甲斑蝥素人体药动学研究。

sentences.english: By using 3P97 pharmacokinetic program, the concentration-time curves were fitted as one compartment open model.
sentences.chinese: 经用3P97药动学程序拟合符合一室开放模型。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the effect on body pharmacokinetics of chitin as tablet additive.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究甲壳胺作为片剂辅料对人体药动学的影响。

sentences.english: Conclutions The pharmacokinetics of gastrodin injection in volunteers was accorded with two compartment model.
sentences.chinese: 结论天麻素注射液的人体药动学符合药动学二室模型。

sentences.english: Pharmacokinetics of Domestic Cilostazol Tablets in Chinese Healthy Volunteers;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究西洛他唑片在人体内的药动学。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the characteristics of nasal mucosa absorption of ligustrazine phosphate and its pharmacokinetics.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究磷酸川芎嗪的鼻黏膜吸收特性及体内药动学。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate pharmacokinetic properties of brucine in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察马钱子碱在大鼠体内的药动学性质。

sentences.english: The pharmacokinetic parameters were calculated according to non - compartment model.
sentences.chinese: 用非房室模型参数估算法计算药动学参数。

sentences.english: Effects of borneol on the pharmacokinetics of scutellarin in rats;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大鼠灌胃给药灯盏花乙素苷元的药动学。

sentences.english: AIM To study the pharmacokinetics and bioavailability of clinafloxacin in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究克林沙星在大鼠体内的药动学和生物利用度。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the pharmacokinetics of tramadol hydrochloride in Chinese Han healthy volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究盐酸曲马多胶囊在汉族健康人体内的药动学。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a HPLC-ECD method for determining scutellarin in rat plasma and to study pharmacokinetics of scutellarein in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大鼠灌胃给药灯盏花乙素苷元的药动学。

pinyin: yao4 wu4 dai4 xie4 dong4 li4 xue2

definition: propranolol (beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure)
